translation.tagalog: Jermaine Matin-Santos. Yes, ma'am. Kayo na po ito.
Ma'am, Smith Grace po ito, ma'am. Financial officer po ako, ma'am, ng AMG. On behalf of Maya,

translation.tagalog: for security purposes, pa-confirm po ng last four digit number na gamit niyo kay Maya. Tama po ba? 2029.
translation.english: For security reasons, please confirm the last four digits of the number you used with Maya.

translation.tagalog: 2029. Ma-band checking po sa inyong Maya account. 67 days na po silang overdue. Amounting of 13,700.90.
translation.english: The amount of money that you have to pay to your account is 67 days, which is overdue.

translation.tagalog: Nag-email po ako dun sa email address niyo po.
translation.english: I've e-mailed you to your e-mail address.

translation.tagalog: Kasi sa papanganak. Opo. Kasi nanganak po ko na CSPOO po.
translation.english: I'm a baby, and I'm going to be a baby, and I'm going to be a baby, and I'm going to be a baby.

translation.english: I was a CSO on December 3, 2017.

translation.tagalog: Yes, ma'am. Pero, ma'am, bago po kayo mga anak, ma'am,
translation.english: Yes, ma'am. But, ma'am, before you children, ma'am,

translation.english: I'm not sure if it's a semi-semi or a semi-semi but it's been 67 years, and I'm still here.

translation.tagalog: Almost three months na rin po, ma'am.
Hindi po, ma'am, kasi nag-a- na- nag-a- kasi sa pampanak ko yung pambayad. Opo, kasi biglaan po ko na CSP.

Okay, ma'am, this is it, ma'am.

translation.tagalog: Eh, kung pwede po sana, ma- ano, ma-convert po sana ng installment.
translation.english: If it were possible, I would have converted the installments.

translation.tagalog: Kasi, ma'am, si Maya po, ma'am, hindi siya pumapayag ng installment po, ma'am. Kung magagawa niyo po siya ng paraan, ma'am, at least makapagpayment po kayo. Half po. Starting po tomorrow, ma'am. Makapagpayment po at ma'am po.
translation.english: Well, ma'am, Maya, ma'am, she's not paying the installment, ma'am. If you can do it somehow, ma'am, at least you can pay it. Half a po. Starting tomorrow, ma'am.
He will be given a chance.

translation.english: So, I'm talking to you because... so I'm talking to you because, Mom, because whatever... if I don't have a smell, how can I settle him?

Magkakaroon na rin niyo po kayo, ma'am, ng bad record po kayo, Maya, ma'am. And yung gawin niyo na lang, ma'am, magawa niyo na lang sana siya ng paraan, ma'am, masettle niyo po siya, ma'am. magagawa, ma'am. Sa collection lang po kasi kami, ma'am. Kung ano po sinabi sa amin ni Maya, within three days po talaga, ma'am, pinapagawa kayo ng paraan. Kaya sabi niyo nga po, ma'am, hindi niyo siya magagawa ng paraan. Yun nga po, ma'am, asahan niyo po, ma'am, yung mga consequences po ni Maya, ma'am. Yun lang po, ma'am, talaga.
